overview: This is about real people, and the real stories that define them sexually ... "Eastside Story" takes us into the heart of East LA, and into the hearts of an eclectic group of porn performers. They tell tales on camera, then fuck as part of a series of art installations â€“ handcrafted by visionary director, Vena Virago. Eastside Story is part documentary, part abstract painting, and all-out multi-cultural hardcore ... This is an art movie pushed beyond the accepted boundaries of triple-x ...
title: Eastside Story
